mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gather(nickname, title, content, place, gmemberno, startdate, enddate) VALUES(#{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{place}, #{gmemberno}, STR_TO_DATE(#{startdate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), STR_TO_DATE(#{enddate}, '%Y-%m-%d'))
mapper.select: SELECT gatherno, title, place, views, nickname, DATE_FORMAT(startdate, "%Y-%m-%d") startdate, DATE_FORMAT(enddate, "%Y-%m-%d") enddate, DATE_FORMAT(createdate, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i") createdate, content, gmemberno, gnewno FROM gather ORDER BY gatherno DESC LIMIT ${param1.postsPerPage} OFFSET ${param1.offset}

SELECT gatherno, title, place, views, nickname, DATE_FORMAT(startdate, "%Y-%m-%d") startdate, DATE_FORMAT(enddate, "%Y-%m-%d") enddate, DATE_FORMAT(createdate, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i") createdate, content, gmemberno, gnewno FROM gather WHERE gatherno=#{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE gather SET views=views+1 WHERE gatherno=#{param1}
UPDATE gather SET gnewno=gnewno+1 WHERE gatherno=#{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gatherreply(content, nickname, gatherno) VALUES(#{content}, #{nickname}, ${gatherno})
mapper.select: SELECT replyno, content, nickname, gatherno, DATE_FORMAT(writedate, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i")writedate FROM gatherreply WHERE gatherno=#{param1} ORDER BY replyno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE gatherreply SET content=#{content} WHERE replyno=${replyno}
